mapper.insert: insert into members(num, id, password, repassword, name, year, month, day, email, hp1, hp2, hp3, add1, add2, style, cat, age, gender) values(mseq.nextval,#{id},#{password},#{repassword},#{name},#{year},#{month},#{day},#{email},#{hp1},#{hp2},#{hp3},#{add1},#{add2},#{style, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cat, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{age, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{gender, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id from members where email=#{email} and name=#{name} and hp1=#{hp1} and hp2=#{hp2} and hp3=#{hp3}
select password from members where id=#{id} and name=#{name} and email=#{email}
